# Liquid Pain (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[Pain (Domain)|Pain 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 day

**Components:** V, S, F (a jar, vial, or other container for the liquid pain)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 98

Over the course of one day, the caster takes a subject already in great pain—wracked with disease, the victim of torture, or dying of a wound, for example—and captures its pain in liquid form. This physical manifestation of agony can be used to create magic items or enhance spells (see Pain as Power in Chapter 2 of the *Book of Vile Darkness*). It can also be used as a potent drug.
